group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:The clamor of the conflict@that began at dawn now dies down,@as numerous wounded Magical Girls@make their way back home.]
[textBlack:The four ][textYellow:Kimochi][textBlack: stones@gathered by Promised Blood@answered the suspicions in everyone's mind,@revealing their true intentions@as clear as day.]
[textBlack:They, who were once Eve,@desire to return to that Witch,@and are using Magical Girls to do so.]

[textBlack:Now that the ][textYellow:Kimochi][textBlack:'s evil intentions were@brought to light, I thought the ongoing conflict@would finally be put to rest, but the people of@Promised Blood, stones in hand,@were confident that they could control the@Automatic Purification System,@and chose to continue the battle.]

[textBlack:Thus, I believe it became clear that@the ][textYellow:Kimochi][textBlack: and Magical Girls@were using one another,@and the struggle against Promised Blood@began its countdown towards the end.]
[textBlack:Iroha found her way, no longer lost...]

group_1.textRight: You're going to the Coordinator's to treat@Miss Kanagi, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I think today is the special day,@so I wanted her to recover in time.

group_1.textRight: Iroha, will you be participating as well?

group_1.textLeft: It's her last time on stage,@so I want to be there myself.
What about you, Kagome?

group_1.textRight: I was asked as well, but I may have to be a little late...

group_1.textLeft: That reminds me, you were invited by Touka@and Nemu, weren't you?

group_1.textRight: Yes, and since Kamihama itself is about to become@busier because of the elections,
I would also like to see how Miss Mitama's side@is doing.

group_1.textLeft: So first, you're going to the Coordinator's,
and then right after meeting Mitama...@you're going to Touka's,@
No wonder you can't help being late.

group_1.textRight: I'm glad you said it like that.
...The other day, I was asked something clearly@for the first time in a long while,
but everyone, including you, Iroha,@never ask me things.

group_1.textLeft: Hm? What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: Ah, nothing, just about what I do...@Or the information I know about each group...

group_1.textLeft: I never thought about that,@but I guess you're right...?
Maybe no one wants you to have a hard time@moving around?

group_1.textRight: I wonder if everyone is being careful of me...

group_1.textLeft: I think everyone subconsciously wants you to stay@in one piece.

group_1.textRight: It's a bit of a strange feeling.

group_1.textLeft: At the very least, it's how I feel.
Kagome, you wish for the future we all desire.
You're interviewing each and every person@and saving it for the future, right?

group_1.textRight: Yes...

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure anyone who reads them will feel at peace,
regardless of whether they're Magical Girls or not.
Every girl in your book is a human,@just like everyone else.
So did you take any photos of the fight@at the old subway?

group_1.textRight: Yes, and I even got some beautifully taken videos.

group_1.textLeft: I wonder if posting these together with the gas leak@fiasco would stir up some excitement.

group_1.textRight: Whaaat!?
<Y-you can't do that, Touka!@Wouldn't Iroha and everyone be arrested...!?>
What Kagome Satori said.
If the police find out, Big Sis Iroha and everyone@will be taken away.

group_1.textLeft: They're all minors, they're fiiine.
Better yet, this is our chance to let the whole world@know that Magical Girls exist!

group_1.textRight: In an endlessly negative image, yes.
This isn't like you.@You seem to be a little impatient, Touka.

group_1.textLeft: This is just the start,@so I wasn't really paying attention,
but the reactions on social media would be@pretty mixed, meow...
I also found the account of a girl@who seems to be a Magical Girl,
but despite all the flashy content,@she doesn't get much of a reaction out of people...

group_1.textRight: Isn't there a problem with the discrepancy between@the public's interest and the method itself?

group_1.textLeft: That's why I'm doing my part as a genius creator@to attract interest.
There are people that seem interested, but only at about one-tenth of the reactions I was expecting...
...By the way,@there is one terrible hypothesis, buuut...

group_1.textRight: What would that be?

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Kagome Satori.

group_1.textRight: Y-yes...!?

group_1.textLeft: Can you provide me information about Futatsugi@and Tokime?

group_1.textRight: (She asked me immediately...)

group_1.textLeft: Ah, but nothing about the fighting.

group_1.textRight: So that's what you meant...

group_1.textLeft: Of course, I'll keep their backgrounds and@upbringings a secret!

group_1.textRight: Is this related to social media?

group_1.textLeft: I'd rather it not be...

group_1.narration: On this day, after taking care of business@with Touka and Nemu, and investigating@the dark part of Kamihama with Miss Mitama@and others, I went to a maid cafe.
It was where Ikumi had been working,@and everyone was invited by Miss Kanagi.
Just looking around,@I could tell everyone at the front of the stage@were Magical Girls.
Many people who watched over Ikumi@and supported her were crowded around,@waiting for her to take the stage one last time.

group_1.textCenter: Welcome, Master,@what would you like to drink?

group_1.textRight: [chara:102001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]!?
U-umm...

group_1.textLeft: Greetings like this are the rule here.
She sang, she danced, she worked as a maid.@I can't help but honor Ikumi.

group_1.textRight: <Kagome,@this kind of store makes me nervous...>

group_1.textLeft: I see.
Then to be safe,@I shall prepare some Darjeeling tea for you.

group_1.textRight: <T-that's fine...!>

group_1.textLeft: Mm, pardon,@it seems it's time.

group_1.narration: When the time came, the chatter stopped,@loud music came through the speakers@as everyone's cheers overlapped with each other's@inside that tiny cramped shop.
Once again,@I'll be sending looots of love to my masters♪
Kumi's still bashful@about being a 19 year old flower♪@But she still shines brightly@as everyone's angel, riiight?
I'm sure@everyone is watching Ikumi as she smiles@out across the empty stage.
But the only thing I could hear@was soft muttering.
"We were supposed to make our dreams come true@together."
Sorrow begets sorrow.@That small murmur made me realize@my heart is filled with the sense of helplessness.

group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:"What I desire has not changed@since long ago."]
[textBlack:   "Spending time as a normal girl,@   living as a normal woman@and having a family,@raising my child when they are born,@and dying as a grandmother@surrounded by my grandchildren."]
[textBlack:   "That being said,@   the moment I became a Magical Girl@I started going in reverse@since I couldn't find@the rail I wanted to ride anymore,@so it is all in vain now."]
[textBlack:  "However, I have not given up,@  and that is why I am working hard@to expand the Automatic@Purification System as one with the@Kamihama Magia Union."]
[textBlack:"Though not being one of the chosen@members does make me a little sad..."]
[textBlack:   "Ah, I cannot be so negative.@As their senior, I must create@an atmosphere that doesn't@bring down everyone around me."]
[textBlack:  "I spoke a little negatively just now,@but truthfully, I am not negative about@my current situation."]
[textBlack:   "There is still a path@filled with hope for salvation,@where no one will become Witches."]

[textBlack:  "And because I passed the@  university entrance exam@  Touka imposed upon me,@instead of listening to my parents and@taking over the Mizuna kimono shop,@I feel like I can walk the path@of a normal girl."]
[textBlack:   "And I am still connected with my@matchmaking partner that led me to@the opportunity to join@the Wings of Magius."]
[textBlack:   "So even though@   it has not been smooth sailing,@   a tailwind is blowing.@If I can reach a new world@for Magical Girls@while this wind blows at my back,@I would feel so overjoyed."]
